room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Virginia Beach in Virginia Beach
review: First time for an escape room experience and it was awesome!!! There were 8 of us friends and we did the museum heist. Dragon was absolutely awesome !! He was great with hints and questions to make you think !! If not we would probably still be there... Lol we will definatly be back again!!!

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Virginia Beach in Virginia Beach
review: My husband and I were in the museum heist room tonight. We broke out with 3 min to spare with a lot of help from #blondie. This was well worth the money and super fun!! I would recommend it to all my friends and family! We will be back! Thanks again #blondie for all you helpful hints you rock!!!!

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Virginia Beach in Virginia Beach
review: This is the best place for escape room fun! We have done the Hostage, Museum Heist (favorite) & Operation Casino rooms. Definitely give it a try. It is full of intricate clues & mystery details that are unmatched at any other escape room. We canâ€™t wait to try other rooms or the new ones that they add. Great time, thanks #sunshine you were a fabulous clue master!

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Virginia Beach in Virginia Beach
review: I experienced the museum heist. It was fun, we had a group of 6 and it was beneficial that at least one person had been through an escape room previously. The clues were helpful and we probably would not have gotten out without the clues. Fun experience!!

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Virginia Beach in Virginia Beach
review: An absolute blast kept us going right up to the final seconds literally broke out with one second to spare!!! Highly recommend it! We can't wait to return and try another themed room!!!
